name: Oh God Oh No, I Can't Stop Shooting!
name_original: Oh God Oh No, I Can't Stop Shooting!
description:
A lone frog stumbles upon a gun...and picks it up. They feel compelled to pull the trigger. What happens next will surprise you.

Arcade froggy bullet hell wherein YOU are your own worst enemy. 

Made for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam.
